Name: Arclight "Midnight" Pistol
Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Pistol
Class: Energy (Laser)

Magazine Size: 60
Rate Of Fire: 300 rpm
Effective Range: 30 m

Attachments: Optics (S1), Barrel (S1), Underbarrel (S1)

A handheld laser made famous as Kyle Fenrisâ€™ sidearm on the hit vid show The Frontier, the Klaus & Werner Model II Arclight has become extremely popular on the civilian market. Despite its media appeal, the Model II offers a higher rate of fire than any of its ballistic counterparts. While that may diminish the weapon's stopping power, its power cell offers more than enough shots to finish the job.
